person.persName: John L. Martz (Louisville, Kentucky, city marshal and night policeman)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, city marshal and night policeman. Virginia native. Married to Jane Anderson Martz in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on December 4, 1850. Married to Mary Ann Hadfield Martz in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 22, 1856. Served in the 1st Kentucky Infantry as a private from May 16, 1848, to July 12, 1848 in the U.S.-Mexico War. City marshal in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Night policeman in Louisville from 1861 to 1863. Night policeman in Louisville in 1865. Police lieutenant in Louisville in 1865.
